title: Sharing Your Spouse's Burden
itunes:author: Guests: Greg & Erin Smalley
itunes:summary:
In marriage, it's sometimes easy to get caught up in your activities. However, focusing too much on what needs to be done can leave you feeling alone and isolated. John, Greg and Erin discuss creative ways couples can help each other.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the Smalley's book "Reconnected: Moving from Roommates to Soulmates in Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-22?refcd=1332104

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/sharing-your-spouses-burden/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/sharing-the-load-with-your-spouse-digital-download/?refcd=1332104

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
